entry.title: Trump refuses to take responsibility for spike in calls to poison control

media:group.media:title: Trump refuses to take responsibility for spike in calls to poison control
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump says that he takes no responsibility for a spike in people using disinfectants improperly after dangerously suggesting last week that ingesting it could serve as a coronavirus treatment. #CNN #News

entry.title: Bill Gates gives best-case scenario for US economy

media:group.media:title: Bill Gates gives best-case scenario for US economy
media:group.media:description: Microsoft founder Bill Gates gives his take on the right measures the US needs to implement in order to reopen schools and his "best case" for the US economy. #CNN #News

entry.title: Why reporters don't walk out when Trump insults them

media:group.media:title: Why reporters don't walk out when Trump insults them
media:group.media:description:
Brian Stelter asks: Why don't they just walk out when they're insulted? ABC White House correspondent Jonathan Karl, author of "Front Row at The Trump Show, says he gets asked that question often. "As reporters, our job is to be there," he says. "The insults don't matter. Who cares?" He says "we are there to try to get the facts and to put the questions to those who are in power in this country."
#CNN #News #Trump

entry.title: Trump's Twitter rant includes retweet of Covid-19 conspiracy theory

media:group.media:title: Trump's Twitter rant includes retweet of Covid-19 conspiracy theory
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump sent out a series of tweets that included a retweet of a coronavirus conspiracy theory as the White House considers scaling back the daily coronavirus briefings and meetings with the task force.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Stelter: As the US death toll rises, here's what Trump tweets

media:group.media:title: Stelter: As the US death toll rises, here's what Trump tweets
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brian Stelter examines life during the coronavirus pandemic and how people in positions of power are handling it. #CNN #News

entry.title: Brooke Baldwin returns with message of hope after coronavirus fight

media:group.media:title: Brooke Baldwin returns with message of hope after coronavirus fight
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: How Kim Jong Un came to power in North Korea

media:group.media:title: How Kim Jong Un came to power in North Korea
media:group.media:description:
Kim Jong Un, his father and grandfather have ruled North Korea since 1948, steering the country through war, famine and nuclear tests.

media:group.media:description:
Bill Gates joins CNN's Fareed Zakaria to discuss potential timelines for the discovery and production of a coronavirus vaccine.

entry.title: Peter Navarro rejects fellow White House adviser's 'gloom and doom' outlook on economy

media:group.media:title: Peter Navarro rejects fellow White House adviser's 'gloom and doom' outlook on economy
media:group.media:description:
White House trade adviser Peter Navarro on Monday rejected fellow economic adviser Kevin Hassett's dire outlook on the economy during the coronavirus pandemic, calling it "all gloom and doom."
#CNN #News

entry.title: Here's how 'The Good Place' creator Michael Schur is humiliating himself for charity

media:group.media:title: Here's how 'The Good Place' creator Michael Schur is humiliating himself for charity
media:group.media:description:
Michael Schur, the man behind "The Good Place" and "Parks and Recreation," is growing out his beard to imitate the character Mose, who he played on the television show "The Office," after promising his Twitter followers that he would to raise money for the Los Angeles Regional Food Bank.
#CNN #News

entry.title: CNN returns to Wuhan after total lockdown. See what we found.

media:group.media:title: CNN returns to Wuhan after total lockdown. See what we found.
media:group.media:description:
CNN's David Culver returns to Wuhan, ground zero of the the novel coronavirus, three months after the Chinese city of 11 million people went into a 76-day lockdown. Here's what he found.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Conspiracy theorists said she started the coronavirus pandemic. Now she's afraid for her life.

media:group.media:title: Conspiracy theorists said she started the coronavirus pandemic. Now she's afraid for her life.
media:group.media:description:
Conspiracy theorists claim military worker Maatje Benassi brought coronavirus to China. She didn't. Benassi speaks exclusively to CNN's Donie O'Sullivan about how being the target of these theories has ruined her life.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Watch Boris Johnson’s first speech after Covid-19 battle

media:group.media:title: Watch Boris Johnson’s first speech after Covid-19 battle
media:group.media:description:
Returning to work after his recovery from Covid-19, UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson recognized the difficulties presented by the lockdown but urged the nation to "keep going" amid fears of a second wave.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Contrasting images as some California beaches reopen

media:group.media:title: Contrasting images as some California beaches reopen
media:group.media:description: Relaxed restrictions and a record heat wave are sending crowds to some beaches in California amid the coronavirus pandemic. #CNN #News
